summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of admin functionality and branding updates for 251 ΓΝΑ/Κέντρο Μηχανογράφησης attendance system. All backend admin endpoints are secure and functional, frontend branding is correctly updated, and authentication protection is working properly.
passed_tests: All standard CRUD operations functional (9/9 endpoints)
Admin endpoint security - non-admin users get 403 errors correctly
Admin stats endpoint accessible for admin users
Admin clear old sessions functionality working
Login page shows updated branding '251 ΓΝΑ'
Login page shows system description 'Σύστημα Διαχείρισης Παρουσιών'
IT-themed background image from Unsplash displaying correctly
Google login button with correct Greek text and styling
Protected routes working - /dashboard redirects to login when unauthenticated
Protected routes working - /admin redirects to login when unauthenticated
Responsive design working on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
No JavaScript errors or console errors found
Greek text encoding working properly across all elements
